CmdLine: systemctl mask --     -.mount     dev-mqueue.mount     dev-hugepages.mount     etc-hosts.mount     etc-hostname.mount     etc-resolv.conf.mount     proc-bus.mount     proc-irq.mount     proc-kcore.mount     proc-sched_debug.mount     proc-sys-fs-binfmt_misc.mount     proc-sys-fs-binfmt_misc.automount     proc-fs.mount     'proc-sysrq\x2dtrigger.mount'     proc-timer_list.mount     sys-fs-fuse-connections.mount     sys-kernel-config.mount     sys-kernel-debug.mount     tmp.mount     console-getty.service     display-manager.service     getty-static.service     getty@tty1.service     hwclock-save.service     systemd-logind.service     ondemand.service     systemd-remount-fs.service     systemd-tmpfiles-setup.service     systemd-sysctl.service     systemd-modules-load.service     systemd-machine-id-commit.service     systemd-ask-password-console.path     systemd-ask-password-wall.path     swap.target     &&     systemctl set-default multi-user.target     &&     find /etc/systemd/system -type l -name '*.service' -! -exec test -e {} \; -delete
Commands.Name: run
